'''''Close Encounters of the Which Kind?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned during Step 15 of ''[[Lost in the Sands]]''.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
* The Achievement name is a reference to the 1997 American science-fiction film ''{{w|Close Encounters of the Third Kind}}'', directed and written by Steven Spielberg. The theme of extraterrestrial encounters in the film is paralleled in [[Benben]]'s introduction as an unknown flying entity.
